content: a wee little mouse to decorate your tree or for your little one to play with the mouse can be knit flat or in the round there are two hat options a hood that is knit flat and a beret that is knit in the round skills required include stockinette stitch left and right decreases m1 increase bobbles and sewing pieces together materials 15 g worsted weight yarn in main colour mc 10 g of worsted weight yarn in contrasting colour cc small amount of pink worsted weight yarn stuffing pair of 8 mm safety eyes or buttons or black yarn 4 mm us size 6 set of dpns or pair of needles tapestry needle size 8 cm 3 the mouse can also be knit from lighter yarn weights with appropriate needles if you would like a smaller ornament
